sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Pricing, DetailedPrice } from './prices-container.styles'; const PricesContainer = ({ cartItems }) => { const productsAcum = cartItems.reduce((acum, currentItem) => acum + (currentItem.price * currentItem.quantity) , 0) return ( Products {`$${parseFloat(productsAcum).toFixed(2)}`} Shipping Cost $0.00 Taxes $0.00 Total $0.00 ) } export default PricesContainer;
